summary: no less than 13 out of the 22 players on show at kick-off were english . callum gribbin was the matchwinner for manchester united . entry was free and close to 1,000 gathered on the seats and terraces . altrincham 's compact 6,000-capacity home may not be old trafford . first blood to united after their under 18s saw off city 1-0 .
aspect: 1. United's Under 18s defeated City 1-0 in a 'mini-derby' with 13 English players, including 10 Mancunians. 2. Callum Gribbin scored the winning goal with a free-kick, while Marcus Rashford and Cameron Borthwick-Jackson missed opportunities. 3. United now has two points behind leaders Middlesbrough and City has lost both matches in the Under 18s Premier League end-of-season play-off series.
